layer.abstract: This image service contains 9 LAS files covering North Carolina’s, City of Charlotte downtown area. The lidar data was collected in 2007. First return points are used to generate an on-the-fly seamless elevation surface with a 10-foot pixel resolution. The elevation unit is foot. LAS files were provided by Mecklenburg County, NC and are managed using a mosaic dataset. Esri reserves the right to change or remove this service at any time and without notice.
